__e: I'll never go through life doubting that my father loved me, Jo but do you have any idea how much it sucks to know that my father was disappointed in me the day he died?
And I haven't told you already because I know you're going to be disappointed in me... which makes me a coward, really.
Oh, yes. I've been meaning to break this to you gently for some time, and I know you'll be disappointed, but I'm not gay.
Bill, I know you're terribly disappointed, but .. Surely there must be something else that doesn't need all that money?
Look, I know you're really disappointed, but my wife wants to be my tennis partner and she comes first.
Pretty sure that was the most disappointed he's ever been in you.
He just told me he's disappointed in you 'cause you settled.
THE WORST THING A PARENT CAN SAY TO THEIR CHILD IS "I'M NOT MAD AT YOU, I'M NOT UPSET WITH YOU, BUT I'M DISAPPOINTED IN YOU."
Aren't you gonna give me a little bit of credit for not being disappointed in my son?
(Pastor) ...But she had more to worry about than her parents being disappointed or her fiancé being angered.
THE WORST THING A PARENT CAN SAY TO THEIR CHILD IS "I'M NOT MAD AT YOU, I'M NOT UPSET WITH YOU, BUT I'M DISAPPOINTED IN YOU."
But you wouldn't be disappointed if he didn't hook up with a girl, right?
No, but there's somebody... who'll be very disappointed if you don't come.
And I'll be really disappointed if I get second place.
He was very disappointed that he was not to be the first spaceman.
Are you disappointed that I'm a woman?
No, he said, "I'm a-disappointed" for over an hour.
